item.title: About
item.description: I am a passionate process driven web/backend developer 🚀 and also do competitive programming sometimes trying to solve problems using logic helps to keep brain cells active and alert 👨‍💻 .I am currently working as Associate software engineer at Jeavio . I am adaptive to new technology stacks and fast learner . I love to read books and blogs 📘 during my free time and it ranges from tech 💻 to spirtuality 🕉.
